title: ONE MONTH FREE PET FRIENDLY ONE Bedroom
posting_body: Bunker Hight's Apartment Homes is conveniently located in the business and cultural heart of Downtown L.A. China Town.
Each of our Los Angeles apartments presents excellent one-bedroom or two-bedroom floor plans.
Beautiful views of the downtown skyline, spacious kitchens, large living and dining areas, and more await you on Bunker Hill.
From your contemporary hilltop hideaway with sweeping views of the L.A. skyline, the city unfolds before you… and the luxury of Los Angeles surrounds you.
Take in everything that China Town apartments have to offer.
-EV Chargers at 25 cents per Kwh in your parking space
ONE MONTH FREE ON APPROVED CREDIT
one bedroom one bath 1+1  2 bedroom china town downtown Hancock park luxury living luxury apartments little Tokyo south park fashion district
